basic.Peptide Name: Bac2A (a linear variant of bovine dodecapeptide)
basic.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Pseudomonas aeruginosa (MIC=50 µg/ml), Escherichia coli (MIC=17 µg/ml), Salmonella (MIC=34 µg/ml);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=17 µg/ml), Staphylococcus epidermidis (MIC=4 µg/ml), Enterococcus faecalis (MIC=17 µg/ml).Yeast:Candida albicans (MIC=9 µg/ml).
